p: In an investigation of a highly selective agonist of the human adenosine A 3 receptor, DeNinno et al., synthesized different amino nucleosides containing a β 2,3-amino acid motif. Among all of the obtained compounds, Compound 32 and Compound 33 ( Table 5) exhibit moderate levels of selectivity and potency [ 81], whereas CP608039 ( Table 5, Compound 34) binds to the human A 3 receptor with a K i of 5.8 nM and possesses over 1000-fold selectivity versus the human A 1 receptor. The introduction of an amino group at the 3′ position of the nucleoside improved not only the selectivity but also the aqueous solubility of the synthesized derivatives.
